rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0001
rows.name:
I'm telling you, why is exhaust smoke
getting into the cockpit?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0002
rows.name: Isn't there something wrong with the ductwork?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0003
rows.name: Ehh? That shouldn't be the case, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0004
rows.name: Ahh! The intake/exhaust bypass is connected backwards![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh man, who did this?! [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0006
rows.name:
"Who?" you ask?[ST:wide ]― The last mechanic who checked it
was you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Made a mistake?
That's rare for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0008
rows.name: Good thing you had a rugged pilot like Doug at the controls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oh, Elma-san!
Welcome back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0010
rows.name: Elma-san, this person, could it be[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0010_m
rows.name: Elma-san, this person, could it be[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0010_f
rows.name: Elma-san, this person, could it be[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0011
rows.name: Woooow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm Lin Lee Kuu, 13 years old.
I'm doing things like being a mechanic in BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_JNK0010
rows.name: Look Surprised.

rows.label: xs01020100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about her age again.

rows.label: xs01020100_JNK0020
rows.name: Look Interested.

rows.label: xs01020100_SEL0021
rows.name: Stare charmed by her looks.

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0013
rows.name: You look surprised.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0014
rows.name:
But even at her age, she's chosen staff.
Her skills are guaranteed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0015
rows.name:
What is it?
Do I have oil or something on my face?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0016
rows.name: That's not it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0017
rows.name: I can see why you're interested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0018
rows.name: But you know,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0019
rows.name:
despite appearances, she's chosen staff.
Her skills are guaranteed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0020
rows.name: Well, she messes up sometimes, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0021
rows.name: Are you heading back to the BLADE Home now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0022
rows.name: Yes, that's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Since you're here anyway, why don't we take the transport plane?
You can see all of NLA, and I can give you an introduction![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0024
rows.name: Hmm, that sounds like a good idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Doug-san,
please put that Doll away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0026
rows.name: I'm heading back with Elma-san.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0027
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0028
rows.name:
We'll do the flight pack test tomorrow!
See ya![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01020100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Wha- Why do I have to[ST:wide ]―
H-Hey! Lin! Lin![ST:wait ]
